title: Fan
medium: mother of pearl, gold and silver applique, paper mounts
provenance_text:
(Clara Millard, Teddington, England, by January 26, 1916) [1]; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, January 26, 1916; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] Clara Millard was a dealer in rare books and objects. She focused on procuring sought after books and objects "to order" and published extensive catalogues of her holdings, as well as issuing challenges in newspapers daring collectors to stump her ability to locate a rare item.
